Package facade

Class AdminFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • facade.AdminFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade
    public class AdminFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AdminFacade()
      Constructs the class of the admin facade and creating new relevant DBDAO objects for the use of the facade with the DBDAO objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void createCompany​(Company company)
      This method activates the createCompany method in the companyDBDAO class while sending the received company parameter, eventually creating the company's record into the Mysql data base.
      void createCustomer​(Customer customer)
      This method activates the createCustomer method in the customerDBDAO class while sending the received customer parameter, eventually creating the customer's record into the Mysql data base.
      java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
      This method activates the getAllCompanies method in the companyDBDAO class eventually getting and returning a Array List of Company objects from the records in the Mysql data base that represents all of the companies in the system.
      java.util.Collection<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      This method activates the getAllCustomers method in the customerDBDAO class eventually getting and returning a Array List of customer objects from the records in the Mysql data base that represents all of the customers in the system.
      Company getCompany​(long id)
      This method activates the getCompany method in the companyDBDAO class while sending the received company's id parameter, eventually getting and returning a Company object from the company's record in the Mysql data base.
      CouponDBDAO getCouponDBDAO()  
      Customer getCustomer​(long id)
      This method activates the getCustomer method in the customerDBDAO class while sending the received customer's id parameter, eventually getting and returning a Customer object from the customer's record in the Mysql data base.

      The login method for the admin client type user.

        company - - the company object that is filled with the fields of the company to eventually add to the data base.

      • getCompany

        public Company getCompany​(long id)
        This method activates the getCompany method in the companyDBDAO class while sending the received company's id parameter, eventually getting and returning a Company object from the company's record in the Mysql data base.
        Parameters:
        id - - the company's id of the company we wish to eventually get from the data base.
        Returns:
        companyDBDAO.getCompany(id) - A Company object, that represents the company with the given id from the records in the data base.

      • getAllCompanies

        public java.util.Collection<Company> getAllCompanies()
        This method activates the getAllCompanies method in the companyDBDAO class eventually getting and returning a Array List of Company objects from the records in the Mysql data base that represents all of the companies in the system.
        Returns:
        Collection of Company - collection of all the companies in the system in Array list of company objects that we receive from the records of the data base.

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login​(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password,
                                ClientType clientType)
        The login method for the admin client type user. After receiving the parameters, while the clientType is of admin kind, it gets and checks the credentials and if the login is successful, it returns CouponClientFacade of the type AdminFacade and the user can start using the admin different methods, if the login is unsuccessful, the facade is not returned.
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientFacade
        Parameters:
        name - - the user name of the user that wants to log in.
        password - - the password of the user that wants to log in. -
        clientType - - the client type of the user that wants to log in. -
        Returns:
        login - returns the CouponClientFacade object of AdminFacade kind, or null value.
